contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 24, 2007 D Silkeblæs
SilkeBlæs 100 Entertainments Contest SilkeBlæs silkebls
This contest is held every other year. Until 2002 it was held in even-numbered years. It was held in 2005 instead of 2004 and has since continued in odd-numbered years. The same happened in 2017/8, with the 2018 contest divided into sections.
Teatersalen, Silkeborg, Central Denmark, Denmark
Oct. 11, 2011, 10:19 a.m. May 21, 2012, 8:52 p.m.
1 Silkeborg Blaeserne Jan Sørensen
2 Lyngby-Taarbaek Brass Band Jesper Juul Windahl
3 Concord Brass Band Unknown
4 Århus Brass Band Arvid Anthun
5 Nordvestjysk Brass Band Torben Ebbensgaard
6 Odense Brass Unknown
7 Peder Most Gardens Brass Band Gerd Skovlod
8 Skanderborg Brass Band Unknown
9 Hafnia Brass Band Unknown
